attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government interference, political point scoring, and a fixation with irrelevant targets has made policing an impossible job, damaged law and order, and been detrimental to the safety and security of swathes of the population.  Criminals do not live in fear, the law abiding do.  The government must withdraw from interfering with policing, remove its spurious targets, cease to push through ill conceived bright ideas,reduce the bureaucrasy it has imposed, honour the 2.5% pay award, and let chief constables get back to the basics of policing their counties.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
